mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.orders_id AS "ordersId", a.goods_no AS "goodsNo", a.goods_amount AS "goodsAmount", a.cost AS "cost", a.price AS "price", a.price_all AS "priceAll", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN orders b ON b.id = a.orders_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders_details( id, orders_id, goods_no, goods_amount, cost, price, price_all, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ordersId}, #{goodsNo}, #{goodsAmount}, #{cost}, #{price}, #{priceAll}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE orders_details SET orders_id = #{ordersId}, goods_no = #{goodsNo}, goods_amount = #{goodsAmount}, cost = #{cost}, price = #{price}, price_all = #{priceAll}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
